item.title: Hacking Crazy Taxi
item.description: I had a bet with my friend about getting #1 on the Crazy Taxi high score page (== motivation for this post). For those who have not been introduced to it yet, it’s a Facebook/Flash/2.0 resurrection of a much older game. Not having extreme timing skills, I quickly gave up on getting the 2,000,000 points required to make it the “normal” way: My first try was modifying the outgoing HTTP traffic using the Tamper Data plugin for Firefox (to catch the obvious ones).
